overview:
Pam Seiler leads the central and western region sales teams for House Party.

Since joining the company in 2006, Pam has been instrumental in building partnerships with many of the world’s best loved brands, with special focus on the and CPG category.

Prior to that, Pam spent a majority of her career with Hewlett Packard, where she excelled as a Senior Sales Representative & Account Manager, winning a wide range of sales awards and being inducted into the HP Hall of Fame. From there she joined a key HP distributor, Integration Alliance Company, which was purchased by General Electric. She held several roles at IAC, including National Sales Program Manager and Regional Sales Manager, and received the GE President’s Club Award and GE Pinnacle Award.

Pam holds a B.B.A. in Business Administration/Marketing from the University of Iowa. She lives in Colorado with her husband and three children.
